  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2546</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Internet Based Lesson-History of Food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet gründete Lektion-Geschichte der Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Internet a basé la Leçon-Histoire de la 
nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Internet baseou o Lição-lesson-History do 
alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Internet ha basato la Lezione-Storia di 
alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασισμένη στο Διαδίκτυο μάθημα-ιστορία των τροφίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Internet basó la Leccio'n-Historia del 
alimento</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online Assignment for 7-10th grade students on the Hostory of Food. The students have the task of finding information on the history of food and to present the information to the class.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online assignment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Onlineanweisung für 7-1. Gradkursteilnehmer 
auf dem Hostory der Nahrung. Die Kursteilnehmer haben die 
Aufgabe des Findens von von Informationen über die Geschichte der 
Nahrung und die Informationen der Kategorie darzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation en ligne pour les 7-10èmes 
étudiants de catégorie sur le Hostory de la nourriture. Les 
étudiants ont le charger de trouver l'information sur l'histoire 
de la nourriture et pour présenter l'information à la classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição em linha para 7-10ns estudantes da
classe no Hostory do alimento. Os estudantes têm a tarefa de 
encontrar a informação no history do alimento e para apresentar a 
informação à classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione in linea per i 7-decimi allievi del
grado sul Hostory di alimento. Gli allievi hanno l'operazione di
individuazione delle informazioni sulla storia di alimento e 
presentare le informazioni al codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση ανάθεση για τους 7-10ους 
σπουδαστές βαθμού στο Hostory των τροφίμων. Οι σπουδαστές
έχουν τη στοιχειώδη εργασία τις πληροφορίες για την ιστορία των 
τροφίμων και για να παρουσιάσουν τις πληροφορίες στην κλάση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación en línea para los 7-10os 
estudiantes del grado en el Hostory del alimento. Los 
estudiantes tienen la tarea de encontrar la información sobre la 
historia del alimento y presentar la información a la clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlineanweisung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affectation en ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atribuição em linha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">assegnazione in linea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">asignación en línea</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
